metadata.title: PM expresses delight over Pakistanâ€™s election as UNHRC member

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 14 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Tuesday expressed the delight over Pakistan's election as a member of the United Nations Human Rights Council for the 2026-2028 term. Pakistan's election to the UN Human Rights Council reflects its effective and active role at the United Nations, the prime minister said in a statement. "We reaffirm Pakistan's strong commitment to play an active role in the Council for the promotion and protection of human rights across the globe", the prime minister added.
